comments.author: Dave
comments.body: What a drive; Polemics above Settler's Park on Wednesday w/ the Gunthenator, Socratic dialog in Four Mile yesterday w/ Noel, and a spitting contest on Flag today w/ my old nemesis Dr. Dow (who just sold me a cherry [Clark Kent](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clark-Kent_(Bicycles)) for $10). Leaving at noon instead of 12:10, if you want to go with. In front of the UMC. DU
